definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively

sentences.chinese: 我只是一個傳票投遞員。

sentences.english: It was a FedEx delivery man, with a copy of a book on Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 是聯邦快遞的投遞員，給她送來了一本中國歷史書。

sentences.english: The messenger wasn't able to get through to our cabin in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 投遞員無法到達我們的林中小屋。
